clean_data: Software Engineer span lSoftwarespan Engineer Software Engineer Tucson AZ Highly motivated Software Engineer and Application Developer with over 10 years handson experience Seeking a position working on new desktop or web applications with the opportunity to broaden my technical knowledge I have 9 years professional experience with Java 5 years professional experience with JavaScript 3 years professional experience with Scala and familiarity with Python and PHP My most recent work focused on proper utilization of MySQL Guice and Akka to create a high performance web service that offers market data to downstream services I was responsible for converting our service to MySQL from another database format as well as implementing a caching solution that seamlessly integrated with our external service and data dependencies I also implemented parsers for converting input files into domain data for market data custodial data and other service inputs I am authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Software Engineer SigFig Tucson AZ August 2016 to August 2019 Backend development in Java Scala and PHP Work focused on the parsing of large data files representing market data securities portfolios etc and exposing that data through RESTful endpoints Rapidly converted an architecture from Berkeley DB to MySQL Implemented a caching view that is queried with a list of keys and any missing keys are combined into one asynchronous request to load into the cache Senior Software Developer OReilly Auto Parts Phoenix AZ February 2013 to April 2016 Primary responsibility is to accept development tasks JIRA tickets feature requests on one of the companys websites wwwfirstcallonlinecom and work them to conclusion This typically means working with Java the JSP view templates the Spring Framework or the Hibernate backend We also make heavy use of JUnit Git and Maven in the development environment The site is currently undergoing a responsive web design revision that makes heavy use of AJAXoriented frontends with jQuery and Handlebars view templates which I am also contributing to Secondary responsibilities include debugging production issues participating in Agile meetings scrums etc and monitor application health and the health of external service dependencies I developed a subsection of the site an image approval client for permitting or censoring user submitted images before showing on site publicly Not publicly accessible I codeveloped another subsection a shop referral application client Not publicly accessible Software Application Development Engineer MITRE Sierra Vista AZ May 2011 to May 2012 Part of a team responsible for developing a datamining and aggregation solution to a government problem Heavy use of XML StAX parsing technologies on top of Mark Logic a documentoriented database Software Engineer LSI Inc Houston TX June 2010 to January 2011 Application development for SCORM a specialized eLearning format Primary responsibilities were Javaoriented coding but also aided with the ActionScript development used by the design team ActionScript is a Flashoriented cousin of JavaScript Education Master of Science in Information Systems in Information Systems Walden University Minneapolis MN 2014 Bachelor of Science in Computer Systems in Computer Systems University of
